description:
After successful release of Deal or No deal app we are very happy to enter another game called Tap it!!.
    Tap it!! game is most entertainment game in Palm catalog.
    You will never fell bore on this game.
    How to play:
        This game consists of the basic elements like wooden O’les with 5 symbols, and 3 lines namely red, blue, green.
        You should tap the corresponding wooden O’le before it reaches the top the game, when it on the line.
        When the wooden O’le reaches the top of the game then you will loss one life.
        The wooden O’le’s are coming in random order.
        Mean while you will have different powers namely score, lives and clear.
        One power having only one chance to get the power, So you should tap the power when it is on the line, otherwise you will the loose the control.
        This game complexity will increases depending upon the your score.
        When you will get the more score, when if your break the wooden Ole.
    This game is very simple to play.
versionNote: Some internal bugs has been fixed.
